item.title: HELLDIVERS™ 2
item.description:
About This Game


The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence.

Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

URGENT BROADCAST – SUPER EARTH ARMED FORCES

Freedom. Peace. Democracy.
Your Super Earth-born rights. The key pillars of our civilization.
Of our very existence.
But the war rages on. And everything is once again under threat.
Join the greatest military force the galaxy has ever seen and make this a safe and free place to live.

BECOME A LEGEND

You will be assembled into squads of up to four Helldivers and assigned strategic missions.
Watch each other’s back – friendly fire is an unfortunate certainty of war, but victory without teamwork is impossible.

LOADOUTS

Rain down freedom from above, sneak through enemy territory, or grit your teeth and charge head-first into the jaws of combat.
How you deliver liberty is your choice; you’ll have access to a wide array of explosive firepower, life-saving armor and battle-changing stratagems… the jewel in every Helldiver’s arsenal.

REQUISITION

Super Earth recognises your hard work with valuable Requisition. Use it to access different rewards that benefit you, your squad, your destroyer ship and our overall war effort.


THREATS

Everything on every planet wants you dead. That’s what we’re dealing with.
Each enemy has distinct and unpredictable characteristics, tactics, and behavior – but they all fight ferociously and without fear or morality.

THE GALACTIC WAR

Capturing enemy planets, defending against invasions, and completing missions will contribute to our overall effort.


This war will be won or lost depending on the actions of everyone involved.

We stand together, or we fall apart.

item.title: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
item.description:
About This Game

Help Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life, as he explores a forgotten and broken world. Sheepy: A Short Adventure is the first short game from MrSuicideSheep.

An Original Soundtrack

Weaved into the world is an incredible original soundtrack created by Seeking Blue artists Yoe Mase, Hahlweg and Tal Richards (formerly of Echos), currently in development.


Mailing List

Join the Mailing List and be the first to learn about the future of Sheepy, limited edition merch and more.

item.title: Level Unknown: Backrooms Demo
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a chilling journey into the unknown with the game "Level Unknown: Backrooms," a horror-puzzle set in the mysterious realm of the Backrooms. Test your logical skills and nerves in both a single-player adventure or a multiplayer cooperative mode.

Immersive Horror-Puzzle Gameplay

Plunge deep into the unsettling depths of terror, navigating sinister corridors and mysterious chambers in the Backrooms. Solve intricate puzzles, confront supernatural entities, and uncover dark secrets that await. The horror, inspired by the best horror films, is guaranteed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Backrooms Lore

The game faithfully reproduces the Backrooms lore, capturing its key themes and atmosphere. Precise detailing allows players to immerse themselves in this mysterious world. With careful regard to the lore, the game offers a unique experience, transporting players into a surreal space filled with mysteries and puzzles.

Photorealistic 3D Environment

Experience a visually stunning and realistic world, meticulously crafted to immerse you in the nightmarish atmosphere of the Backrooms. Every shadow, every creak, and every flicker of light contributes to the intensity of the experience.

Singleplayer Adventure

Prepare for a solitary journey into the abyss. The single-player mode offers a gripping narrative that unfolds as you explore the haunting Backrooms, with each step increasing tension and horror.

Cooperative Multiplayer Mode

Join forces with friends or other players online to collectively face the terrors of the Backrooms. Communication and collaboration are crucial as you work together as a group. Co-op for up to 4 players elevates the experience to an entirely different level when playing with friends.

Uncover Mysteries

The Backrooms conceal secrets that transcend understanding. Piece together fragments of the story as you progress, uncovering the truth behind the events and learning the fate of those who ventured into this nightmarish dimension before.

Collaboration with Wojtek Gola

As a co-creator and publisher, as well as one of the most influential names in the Polish influencer scene, Wojtek Gola played a pivotal role in the success of the Fame MMA event. Now, he invites you to experience something entirely new. Gather a team with friends and collectively confront the nightmares of the Backrooms in our first collaborative game.

item.title: Dread Dawn Demo
item.description:
About This Game

This is an open-world zombie survival sandbox game set in a city quarantined due to an unknown virus. You will play as a student in the city who failed to catch the evacuation convoy to escape the disaster and was forced to stay. As a modern metropolis, the city is fully equipped with public facilities including hospitals, subway stations, prisons, and schools, where the population density is very high. While exploring the city, you must always be aware of the dangers lurking around you.

You need to stay in the school with the other survivors who remained in the city, defending your camp and surviving.

Utilizing the various materials collected for construction can enhance your camp's defense capabilities. These zombies like to invade your camp when your attention is relaxed.

You can plant some food in the spare areas of your camp, or raise chickens to get eggs. In the absence of food sources, this is a necessary skill for ensuring survival. The surplus crops can also be used for trading with other survivors.

item.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League
item.description:
About This Game

From Rocksteady Studios, the creators of the Batman: Arkham series, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is a genre-defying third-person action shooter where the ultimate band of misfits must do the impossible to save the world: Kill the Justice League.


Join the newly “recruited” members of Amanda Waller’s infamous Task Force X (aka the Suicide Squad), Harley Quinn, Deadshot, Captain Boomerang and King Shark, as they set out on an impossible mission to Kill the Justice League. Drop into an expansive and dynamic open-world Metropolis ravaged by Brainiac’s invasion and terrorized by the heroes who once protected it.


Each Squad member brings their own traversal mechanics to help them navigate a sprawling and battle-torn Metropolis, combining free-roaming exploration and combat verticality for an unforgettable experience. Players are free to experiment with a variety of different play styles to unleash maximum damage on their enemies. Whether in single player or online with up to three of your friends, players can take on this suicide mission their own way.

Post-launch, players can expect a continuously evolving Metropolis with free new playable villains, environments, weapons, in-game events, and more, all included with purchase of the base game.

item.title: Sunray OS
item.description:
About This Game

Sunray OS is a mystery-horror game in which you must investigate the disappearance of a guy whose only connection to you is that he was the previous owner of your new computer.

To do this, you will have to interact with a fictional operating system inspired by real systems, using applications, browsing websites, watching videos, or chatting with "Zippy", a chatbot who seems to have something wrong with it.

Sunray OS features a linear but well-detailed storyline, unexpected events, mysteries to solve in order to progress, and hidden secrets.

WILL YOU SOLVE THE MYSTERY?

You just bought a cheap PC online. Suddenly, however, you discover that you are not the first owner of the PC, and the person who owned it before you has seemingly vanished into thin air. Your PC becomes the only real clue to track him down.

A FULLY EXPLORABLE PC

Explore clues by interacting with over 10 highly detailed websites, delve into 10+ applications, and enjoy a fully customizable desktop. Remember to take breaks from the investigation and relax with music and videos.

A RICH AND ENTERTAINING STORY

What happened to the previous owner? Why is this "Zippy" chatbot acting weird? What secrets is this OS hiding? With numerous mysteries to unravel and people to talk to, what will be your first move?

item.title: Upward
item.description:
About This Game

Upward, an exhilarating platform game, revolves around the protagonist finding themselves on a mysterious island after a plane crash. Our charming hero, determined to escape the island, focuses on reaching the highest points of the platforms encountered throughout the journey. However, this mission proves to be much more complex and filled with adventure than anticipated.

In each level, obstacles abound, not only comprising physical challenges but also featuring various traps that demand strategic thinking and quick reflexes. The platforms, designed with meticulous care, ascend in difficulty as you climb upward, offering a spectrum of colors tailored to each level. This ensures that every stage of the game presents players with new excitement and challenges.

item.title: Fool's End
item.description:
About This Game



Descend into an intense world of chaotic mining and platforming in Fool's End.

Choose to fight your way out with a pickaxe, or use your wits to manipulate the environment and create your own exit. Escape each level in your own way. Everything is destructible....



Take control of the Fool, a degenerate on a desperate mission to navigate his way out of a tangled system of caves. Dig through and manipulate environmental hazards, evade powerful monsters, smack enemies into lava and bombs, and prepare for an adventure in a land of chaos.



Fool's End includes an original soundtrack with 16 tracks composed by Chris MacClure.



  • Blast your way through fully destructible tile-based terrain.
  • High-risk quickfire gameplay.
  • Over 35 hand-crafted replayable levels with collectibles.
  • Quirky unique enemies with dramatic boss fights.
  • Time trials unlocked after finishing each biome.



  • Flavourful pixel art and animations.
  • Bumping dynamic original soundtrack.
  • Secret sauce and beverages.

item.title: Spiritfall
item.description:
About This Game


Spiritfall combines tight Platform Fighter combat, smooth movement, and Roguelite mechanics into one! Trek across dangerous lands, string together deadly combos to fend off swarms of enemies, and harness an ever-changing set of powers through a randomly generated map.



The divine spirits offer powerful blessings that enhance your abilities in combat. Discover your favorite abilities, and experiment with different builds. With over 150+ blessings to choose from, these gifts allow for a range of tactical approaches that encourage you to find synergies that fit your playstyle.


Death is but a temporary setback. Reawaken stronger than before at the Sanctum and continue your adventure. Use the resources you gathered to upgrade your skills, unlock unique powers, and awaken mighty weapons with unique movesets.


A heartfelt thank you to our Early Access community! Your feedback has been invaluable during Spiritfall's development, helping make the game what it is today. We invite you to keep shaping our world together. Connect with fellow players on Discord and get the latest news by joining our newsletter.

item.title: Mega Quiz Gaming
item.description:
About This Game

🖥 Mega quiz gaming: PC version!
Guess all the game quiz levels with over 250 video games that has been a trending until this last year (2024).
Complete this video game trivia where you must guess a lot of video games through clever, humorous and extravagant emoji hieroglyphics.

----- Mega Quiz Gaming features -----

👤 Single & party game:
Play solo or bring the fun to house parties with friends.
💬 Tiktok and Twitch chat game:
Connect to any of your stream platforms, allowing your viewers to play directly from the chat.
🎮 Plenty of levels:
Over 250 different emoji hieroglyphs with an unlockable progression.
👾 Trending games:
Puzzles include from classic games to the upcoming releases of 2024.
💡 Hint system:
Get free hints that reload every few minutes.
🏆 Highscores:
Join the global leaderboard by answering all the gaming questions.

----- Twitch and Tiktok chat integration -----

🔴 Stream:
Available with Twitch and Tiktok live streams where your viewers can play by only using the chat.
🎮 Normal gamemode:
Play on LIVE alongside your viewers as they solve levels, but without spoiling any answers for you.
💤 AFK gamemode:
Go AFK and let your audience engage in a competitive challenge, solving randomized levels in an endless mode.
📈 Growth:
Empower your LIVE interactions and increase your channel visibility in the platform.
🏆 Viewer scores:
Check your followers' session scores, perfect for giveaways and raffles.

----- Steam version -----

This trivia game is a PC version for the Mega Quiz Gaming app, available for free in Mobile devices.

🎥 Easier streams:
Adapted for PC for easy streaming.
✅ Emoji gamemode:
Guess the games through emoji hieroglyphs.
❌ Shape mode:
Guess the games through their characters, weapons or hats. This gamemode is exclusive for mobile version.
⌨ Keyboard:
Use your physic keyboard to type a quicker answer.
🏆 Independent highscores:
PC players only compete on the PC leaderboards.


The main purpose of #MegaQuizGaming is to show the people the great variety of video games that surround us in a funny way. In #MegaQuizGaming, great titles are mixed with other independent titles, creating a list where players can distance themselves from their usual titles and discover new projects.

item.title: Chunky Tomato
item.description:
About This Game

While delivering tomatoes to a chunky tomato factory, a crate tips over and breaks. A tomato rolls across the floor. In fact, it has legs and just realizes what's going on and rushes toward the factory fence. Behind the fence, a busy road awaits her. But behind it is a peaceful forest! It's up to you whether she makes it or still becomes a chunky tomato.


  • Before you unlock the goal on the other side of the road, you need to collect stars on the road.
  • On the road, not only cars are a danger. There are various obstacles that try to stop you (nails, broken glass, chewing gum...).
  • However, there is also help. Drops are scattered on the road, which will help you to improve.
  • Survive a total of 40 levels, the difficulty of which increases with each level.
  • The distribution of stars and obstacles is random, so each level is individual.

item.title: Aura Wallpaper
item.description:
About This Software

Aura Wallpaper, the ultimate solution for transforming your Windows lockscreen into a captivating canvas of dynamic animations. Aura Wallpaper is a cutting-edge application that redefines the way you personalize your Windows experience.

Unlock a world of possibilities as you seamlessly integrate mesmerizing animated wallpapers directly onto your Windows lockscreen. With Aura Wallpaper, your computer comes to life, showcasing a stunning array of dynamic visuals that react to your every move.


How to use Aura:

  • Start Aura and right click the Aura logo in your task bar
  • Click on Select Wallpaper
  • Browse for your favorite video
  • Fast forward to the point you want your wallpaper to start
  • Click Set LockScreen Wallpaper
  • The video is now your lockscreen wallpaper starting at the same timepoint

item.title: Timber
item.description:
About This Game


Timber invites you to master the art of resource management and city-building. From humble beginnings to an industrial empire, harvest resources, trade strategically, and watch your city flourish.

Experience seamless city-building with Timber's intuitive placing system! Watch as your creations come to life with effortless precision.



Discover the power of progression with Timber's innovative leveling system! Watch as your empire evolves and grows, reaching new heights with each level.



Get ready to seize opportunities as train orders arrive, shaping your empire's success!



Watch as your city evolves and grows with each new residence.



Explore the depths of strategic resource management, the excitement of dynamic trade, and the satisfaction of building a thriving city in Timber. With endless possibilities and challenges awaiting, the journey to urban greatness begins now. Are you ready to forge your empire?

item.title: Over the Net
item.description:
About This Game

Over The net is a simple, casual sport game which require good reflex.

Move your player and try to win match with opponents in two game modes - 1vs1 or 2vs2.

Choose your favourite arena. You can choose beautiful, sunny beach, dark castle, typical USA school or unexplored Mars planet.

Most of music is made by Liborio Conti, very telented composer. Enjoy it!

Because its my first Steam Project I strongly recommend you to write review. Your opinion is very important to me. Don't hesitate to express your criticism.

Thanks for your support!

item.title: Linxy The Lynx
item.description:
About This Game

Linxy is known for saving his home (Mangoberry Island) from the nefarious Prof.B.Ray on a weekly basis and this time it's not all that different, B.Ray is up to some scheme that revolves using his Nature Taker-er to power his Linxy Destroyer-er!

Overview
Play as Linxy and use his slick moves to get to Prof.B.Ray's fortress! Along the way you'll find bounce pads and aerial bounce pads that'll boost you vertically and horizontally respectively, you'll encounter grind rails that Linxy can ride at high speeds but it's not a smooth ride you'll need to be quick in order to jump bottomless pits, stalagmite pits and lava pits that split rails apart!

Collectables
Along your way you'll find little motherboard looking things called Remix Chips, these chips allow you to unlock new levels that are harder and introduce a couple of new mechanics you won't encounter on your normal journey.
Collect a ton of Coconuts for a final secret!

Moveset
Linxy has an easy to learn hard to master moveset so anyone at any skill level can pick up the game and play!
Linxy has your typical jump, a double jump, a slide and a slide jump!
The slide jump prioritizes distance over height so if you want to get up to higher ground you're best off normal jumping.
As for a slide it will give Linxy a temporary burst of speed and can be used to pop every enemy in the game!

item.title: Sort It!
item.description:
About This Software

'Sort It!' is a Virtual Reality psychology experiment developed by University of Oxford researchers. It is a one-time game, with 2 levels and takes 25 minutes to complete in total.
Your task is to copy an arrangement of objects depicted in a model display onto a workspace table by picking-up a series of objects from a resource table. You are free to look around the virtual room and pick up/place objects using the grabber tool. Be quick - You only have 45s to complete each arrangement.
The game was developed by researchers in the Adaptive Behaviour & Cognition Laboratory at the University of Oxford. We are interested in understanding in how humans solve complex tasks and how psychologists can use VR studies remotely to investigate this. Everyone is free to play this game. However, only if you've been in contact with us beforehand will your performance in the game be analysed as part of our research. If you would like to participate, please contact us with the email address provided.

Key Features:
Fully immersive, interactive VR gameplay.
Compatibility with all steam compatible VR headset devices.

item.title: EVERING
item.description:
About This Game



EVERING is an adventure RPG with a turn-based combat system and pixel art style that tells an epic story through witty and funny dialogues with charismatic characters in a completely unique and very detailed world where time loops around in circles.

This is an era of peace and the world faces no danger but if this legend turns out to be true... our days could be numbered.





EVERING is a love letter to nostalgia, a tribute to the games we grew up with, with a renewed look and feel, with no random encounters and accessibility options. You don’t want to fight? That’s okay, you can escape every combat with no punishment so you can follow the story at your pace.

The world of EVERING is full of treasures, maestros and crystals to learn new skills and alchemy ingredients. There are secrets hidden in the last place you would imagine. Can you find them all?





• 25+ hours of gameplay

• Great balance between drama and comedy

• A wide variety of towns and dungeons to explore

• Fight unique enemies and bosses in turn-based combat

• Meet a bunch of peculiar characters

• Find lots of lore books that build a detail-rich world

• Solve puzzles, side quests and more!








This is the story of Eldar, Prince of Onnya, who is obsessed with finding the origin of a legend. He has invested his life in it, often forgetting his royal duties. He will soon realize that everything around him is connected and this will lead him to discover something he never imagined.

He will be joined by Lue, a powerful and overprotective witch. On their path they will meet Jövla, a mysterious wanderer skilled with daggers, Laric, an apprentice alchemist with a lot of potential but very little self-esteem and Qibayn, an artist in constant search of inspiration.

Follow the path of a legendary hero to shape your own story

item.title: Kurofune : Descobrimentos Portugueses
item.description:
About This Game

Warning: This is a DEMO version of the final game. We are 4 recently graduated Portuguese Game Developers trying to start a Game Studio.
Every donation is appreciated and will contribute to the development of new games and to improve quality.
Contact us via our Discord server -> (#open-ticked) if you want to contribute.
Thank you, 3PA Studios.

Be the captain of a Portuguese ship on a daring journey from Lisbon to Japan!

Don't expect an easy ride, there are over 20 locations, 50 tradable items, and multiple ships that will not hesitate to steal them from you.
Choose your play style... warriors, medics, cooks, entertainers, or sailors. A mix of all?
Think carefully before making any decision, they will influence your future and also how the rest of the world sees you.
  • Reputation - Negotiators might not like a captain with a bad reputation...
  • Crew Morale - Be careful with riots...
  • Crew Health - You don't want your crew sick.. trust me.
Along the way, there are multiple references to historical battles and items from Portuguese culture. Use your nautical journal to keep track of everything.
Are you the chosen one to reach Japan?



Pirates... they can cause some trouble but the reward could be worth it.



You are the Captain! Tell your crew where to go.



Balancing every variable could be and will be challenging.



Some locations have certain resources and others don't... you can profit from that.



Storms are a nightmare. Don't let your ship sink!

item.title: 废柴队友 Stupid Teammates
item.description:
About This Game

Background

The girl wakes up from the eerie dungeon, and she looks around in fear, unaware that she is about to experience an unforgettable adventure...... Go on an adventure with your buddies and find out the truth behind everything.

gameplay

As a mage, you'll fight alongside two "Stupid teammates." Select the cast direction through ADW, enter the arrows up, down, left, right, and when the arrows match a certain spell sequence, the spell will be automatically released. Diverse enemies, rich spell combinations and entry choices, as well as boss haunts and special levels, bring players a rich and wonderful game experience.Dynamic music sound effects, retro pixel art is also full of highlights!

game duration

Plot mode: 60min+
Challenge mode infinite

Bug feedback and update suggestions

Producer contact QQ: 1223736337

item.title: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake
item.description:
About This Game

Guide two brothers on an epic fairy tale filled with discovery, loss, adventure, and mystery.

With their father suffering from a deadly illness, two brothers must bravely set out to find the “Water of Life,” the one cure that can save him. With no option for failure the brothers must rely on each other using their individual skills to protect one another and overcome the obstacles ahead in this unforgettable journey.



A TIMELESS CLASSIC REMADE
Hailed by critics when it was originally released, Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons is back! Faithful to the gameplay and touching story from 2013, Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons Remake features rebuilt characters and landscapes based on the original and has been updated to the latest generation of graphics, performance, and gameplay. Paired with a re-recorded soundtrack with a live orchestra, prepare for an emotional experience that will take your adventure to all new heights.



EMBARK ON A FANTASTICAL EPIC
Solve puzzles, discover hidden stories, traverse dangerous locations, and fight deadly bosses. In single-player mode, navigate this story as both brothers in tandem or play in local co-op with a friend, each controlling one of the brothers as you play together.



GET IMMERSED IN THE EMOTIONAL WORLD OF BROTHERS
Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons is full of hidden details that reward those who seek them out. In addition to the original hidden treats and rich storyline, the remake has added new secrets to be discovered.

Please note: When playing the game in local multiplayer, at least one controller is required.

item.title: Minami Lane
item.description:
About This Game

Minami Lane is a small, wholesome management game set on a Japanese-inspired street. Create and manage your own street, make sure everyone is happy, and watch the villagers live their lives! Enjoy 2 to 4 hours of playtime, cute tanukis and lots of cats!



Build your street
Build homes to add villagers to your street, then improve their happiness by beautifying every inch and building a variety of shops & attractions! These include ramen shops, boba cafes, bookstores and more, each with unique inventories and effects.



Manage your shops
Attract customers with everything from floral bouquets to karaoke! Shops you create will need your careful guidance to offer the right products at the right prices. Lead them to success and make your neighborhood thrive.

Watch your villagers live their lives
Once you start the day, you'll get to see each villager react to your street and offer helpful feedback on how to improve! Memorize their preferences and refine your street the following day.



Reach your objectives
Complete missions to unlock new levels with more buildings, villager types, and other surprises.



What Minami Lane offers:
  • 2-4 hours of play time
  • Create and customize your own adorable street
  • Manage shops by adjusting their inventory, recipes, and prices
  • Play strategically to complete each level's mission objectives
  • Keep the streets clean by picking up trash
  • Tanukis and cats!



What Minami Lane does not offer:
  • Hardcore strategy
  • Multiplayer
  • Tons of missions
  • New levels after release



In Minami Lane's missions, you'll need to strategically plan each day and use random events to your advantage to complete multiple objectives.



The sandbox mode focuses on creativity and relaxation, allowing you to immerse yourself in the peaceful, cozy world without the stress of objectives.



Minami Lane is the collaborative effort of Dorian (Doot), Doriane (Blibloop) and Antoine (Zakku). Doot, a former data scientist turned game developer, brings light strategy and management gameplay, while Blibloop breathes life into the isometric world with her Studio Ghibli-inspired, hand-drawn designs. Zakku adds the finishing touches with joyful, wholesome music compositions and soundscape. We really hope you will enjoy this tiny game we made with love 💕

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2678990/Minami_Lane/

item.title: Ufouria: The Saga 2
item.description:
About This Game

Upyo! How's everyone been?
SUNSOFT's Ufouria is back!

- An authentic evolution of the original "Ufouria"!

Rampage through the fluffy feltwork arts-and-crafts recreation of the world of Ufouria, with your trusty crew from the original game in this exploration-based action side-scroller. Of course, newcomers to Ufouria are welcome too!

- Adventure in the lovingly crafted wacky world of Ufouria!

Familar characters and stages of the original game are back, transformed from their formal pixel art to charming handmade feltwork. Iron bead artwork also plays homage to the nostalgic pixelated look of the original.
Look for all the similarities and differences if you've played the original before!

- Different courses each time you play!?

The various stages from the original game now change randomly every time your enter, making for a fresh new challenge each time! New characters joining your crew let you reach more areas. You might even find areas that weren't in the original game at all...

- Popoons are now a super powerful cleaning agent!

A new threat, one that wasn't in the original...the icky Bumyon makes an appearance! The troublesome Bumyon sticks to everything and everyone and is quite the annoyance, but somehow Hebe and crews can counteract them perfectly with their Popoons. Clean up the Bumyons that litter the planet and thwart the Utsujin's evil plans!

  • Visit the never before seen Hebe's house!
  • Meet rare characters that were only ever seen before in Ufouria art books!
  • A Collection feature lets you read up on enemies and their backgrounds!

item.title: 六面∞臂（Rokumenhappi）
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a puzzle game born from dice.
If the faces change, the way you play will change; if the number of faces increases, the ways you can play will increase.
Please fully enjoy the world of Rokumen Happy.

how to play

Aim for the goal on the board while rolling Rokumen with six different faces.
Each face has its own characteristics, so use them to overcome obstacles on the board!
There is no single path to the goal, and you can play with free operations.
Once you have cleared the stage, try playing with the shortest number of moves.

Rokumen


If you rotate it on a flat surface, the position of your face will change.
Each of the six faces has different characteristics,
Something with rules like dice that everyone knows.

faces


Happy face, angry face, disgusted face, sad face, surprised face, fearful face
Each face has different characteristics, such as eliminating obstacles, counting down, being chased by enemies, etc.

item.title: Fleximan
item.description:
About This Game

Are you ready to become Fleximan, the paladin of the streets? In this adrenaline-fueled game, your mission is simple yet bold: to save citizens from fines and restore justice on the streets of our small Venetian city.

In the role of Fleximan, you'll have an arsenal of tools at your disposal to combat road injustice. Here's what awaits you:

Destroy Speed Cameras: Drive at full speed through the streets, locate the speed cameras, and destroy them! Use your flexible hammer to smash those annoying devices that threaten citizens with unjust fines.

Eliminate Speed Bumps: Speed bumps on the road slow down traffic and annoy drivers. Crash into them and make the streets safer for everyone. Remember, you are the defender of honest drivers!

Explore the City: Our small Venetian city is full of secrets. Explore every alley, square, and canal. You might find clues about new speed cameras or discover intriguing stories.

Game Features:

Gameplay: it's a Third Person game whit no sense components

Fast Gameplay: Complete the game 100% in less than 30 minutes. Perfect for a quick play session!

Intense Exploration: Discover every corner of the city and find hidden secrets.

Updates: If there are updates, they will introduce new memes and fun challenges.

Get ready to become the superhero of the streets in Fleximan: Speedy Revenge. The city is counting on you to free it from fines and restore justice! 🚗💥🔨

item.title: PEPITA VIAJERA ARCTIC
item.description:
About This Game

Pepita Viajera Arctic is an action-adventure platform game whose protagonist is Pepita Viajera. Pepita Viajera travels around the world, she is an adventurer, she loves nature and the people of all continents. She travels on her airplane but sometimes everything doesn't go as expected.

Help Pepita Viajera recover the pieces of her plane, which she lost when she landed unexpectedly in the Arctic. Avoid obstacles and reach the Inushuck in each phase to answer the questions that will help you recover the pieces of the plane and allow Pepita Viajera to continue her journey around the world.

item.title: STAR WARS™: Dark Forces Remaster
item.description:
About This Game



Star Wars™: Dark Forces Remaster has been brought to life by the team at Nightdive Studios, fully remastered through its proprietary KEX engine, allowing the game to run on modern gaming devices at up to 4K resolution at 120FPS. New and returning players will enjoy Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster’s upgraded gameplay, high-resolution textures, enhanced lighting and rendering, and support for gamepads.

The original 1995 Star Wars: Dark Forces raised the bar for FPS games, offering players a significant degree of movement and interactivity, a large selection of items and power-ups, and engaging environments.



In the first Star Wars FPS video game, players assume the role of Kyle Katarn, a defector of the Galactic Empire turned mercenary for hire. Katarn joins the Rebel Alliance’s covert operations division tasked with infiltrating the Galactic Empire, where he discovers the secret Dark Trooper Project. The development of this powerful new series of Imperial battle droids and power-armored stormtroopers stands to strengthen the Empire’s grip on the galaxy unless Katarn and the Rebel Alliance intervene.

Key Features:


  • All fourteen original levels, featuring Star Wars™ worlds and capital ships
  • Use your ability to jump, duck, and crawl to solve puzzles and defeat enemies
  • Your Personal Digital Assistant provides you with in game information such including map, inventory, and mission briefing
  • Engaging first-person ground combat featuring ten weapons and twenty types of enemies
  • Up to 4K 120FPS visuals
  • Advanced 3D rendering enables updated lighting and atmospheric effects
  • Modern gamepad support adds a new weapon wheel, and rumble
  • Controller Support - vibration and gyro controls
  • A variety of power-ups are made available to the player, including health, shields, weapons and ammunition
  • For combat, the player may use fists, explosive landmines and thermal detonators, as well as blasters and other ranged weapons
  • Includes immersive environmental puzzles and mazes

item.title: Timemelters
item.description:
About This Game

FRIEND'S PASS NOW AVAILABLE!

You can now play the whole Co-op campaign and the new Speedrun Mode with a Friend!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2477230/Timemelters__Friend_Pass/



Timemelters is a strategy and hero defense hybrid game that allows you to unleash the power within and become a time-warping witch! Step into the shoes of Teagan, after a narrow escape from a witch trial, embark on a quest to unravel the mysteries surrounding her new powers and alter the course of the future. Get ready to engage in strategic battles against dangerous foes, manipulate the environment to your advantage, and explore a world teetering on the brink of doom.

Featuring a single-player and co-op campaign, prepare for a fantastical and dark adventure with a unique twist on time-travel mechanics.

Features:


Unique Time Shift game mechanic: rewind time and fight alongside yourself, not as an AI, but in a fully deterministic fashion. Plan out truly custom strategies and play to your own style! Experience Co-op game mechanics (aggro, support, etc.) all while playing solo!



Hybrid Action-Strategy gameplay: Plan a strategy and execute it all in real time, across distinct missions! Puzzle maps, boss fights, escort missions, survival, etc. -- each mission has distinct objectives and brings unique twists on the time travel mechanic!



Co-op mode: Play the full campaign with a friend online (2 players) using the free Friend's Pass!



Startling storyline: Engaging campaign with all the twists, turns, nooks, crannies and what-the-bleep-just-happened moments you would -- and should -- expect from a story based on Time Travel!

Challenge and Speedrun Modes: Test your brain power with 40 mind bending, 4D thinking challenges! Or compete the leaderboards in the Speedrun Mode!



Skill Tree: Choose how your spells upgrade -- yielding ever more powerful magic and intricate build choices!

Original Soundtrack: Sumptuous, expansive soundtrack filled with epic moments (and a few earworms)!


This game was made by an indie team of 3 people who prioritized innovative game mechanics over AAA graphics; and we hope you'll love TimeMelters as much as we do!
Happy gaming!

item.title: Paintball - the puzzle game
item.description:
About This Game

Paintball is a top down puzzle game for 1 to 3 players.
You control three characters (blue, red, yellow) who throw the paintball back and forth. While travelling the ball creates a line. This line has the color of the character who threw the ball. If the paintball travels over an already existing line, the new color and the former color mix together, creating a secondary or tertiary color.

Colorexia, the evil witch possessed by shapes and colors brought 3 guys into one of her dungeons to test her new puzzles. Can you solve them all and regain your freedom?

Each of the 32 levels has a given geometric and colored structure that must be copied. Tasks are sorted by dungons (triangles, quadrilaterals, polygons, polyhedrons, free styles).

In addition, paintball - the puzzle game offers a free play mode, where you can create colored shapes without a task. If you like what you created, you can save the level and make it a task.

item.title: PhotonX
item.description:
About This Game

PhotonX is an exhilarating side-scrolling action game where players take on the role of courageous pilots battling waves of alien invaders. Starting their journey on Earth, players venture into the depths of space, unlocking new aircraft and weaponry to permanently vanquish the extraterrestrial threat. The game features diverse levels, from scenic landscapes of the home planet to the dark depths of space, each offering unique challenges and enemies.

Key Features:
  • Variety of Aircraft and Weapons: Players have access to different aircraft models and types of weaponry, each with unique characteristics and abilities, allowing adaptation to various situations on the battlefield.
  • Intense Battles and Bullet-Hell Mechanics: The game offers dynamic and gripping skirmishes with a plethora of enemy attacks and projectiles on the screen, requiring players' skill and strategic thinking.
  • Epic Boss Fights: Each level concludes with an epic battle against a powerful boss possessing unique abilities and combat tactics, presenting players with serious challenges and the opportunity to apply their skills in battle.
  • Progressive Development: Throughout the game, players can upgrade and enhance their aircraft and weaponry, increasing their power and effectiveness in combat, adding elements of strategy and personalization to the gameplay.
  • Captivating Storyline: PhotonX offers an engaging storyline that leads players through thrilling adventures from Earth to space, telling the tale of humanity's struggle for survival and victory over the extraterrestrial threat.

item.title: Ukraine War 2022
item.description:
About This Game

Ukraine War 2022 is a real-time, tactical land and air warfare simulation game focusing on the ongoing war between Ukraine and Russia. It features 20 scenarios covering not only the land and air battles that actually happened in the year 2022 and 2023, but also several theoretical battles that might take place in the next two years, in case Russia takes decision to escalate the war to a new level.. You are posted as overall commander of the battles on either Ukraine or Russian side, as you may choose in most battles, and tasked with various missions, such as defending the Ukraine capital city of Kyiv, searching and destroying Russian Black Sea Fleet, and launching the 2023 Spring Offensive.

Features:


  • You'll be able to command massive number of land units to mount attacks on enemy defense line, or the other way around, to defeat enemy offensives.

  • You'll be able to manage the airports and heliports, if available in the battle, and organize reconnaissance, combat air patrol and air strikes against enemy ships and land targets.

  • You'll be able to carry out airborne missions to support your land force with transport aircraft or helicopters.

  • Each battle map, covering an area of up to 2000km x 2000km, is built on satellite verified terrain data (mountains, hills, plain, river etc), land cover data (forest, grassland, desert etc.).

    Current Scenarios:


    1. The Kyiv Offensive
    2. The Sumy Offensive
    3. The Kherson Offensive
    4. Southern Donetsk
    5. (Theoretical) Kharkiv Encirclement
    6. Black Sea
    7. Air War
    8. The Hunt for Himars
    9. The Popasna Breakthrough
    10. The Fall of Bakhmut
    11. The Kherson Counteroffensive
    12. The Kharkiv Counteroffensive
    13. Ukraine Spring Counteroffensive (Zaporizhzhia)
    14. Ukraine Spring Counteroffensive (Bakhmut)
    15. 2023 Russian Offensive (Kharkiv)
    16. 2023 Russian Offensive (Avdiivka)
    17. (Theoretical) Towards the Dnipro
    18. (Theoretical) Dnipro Encirclement
    19. (Theoretical) Western Air Support over the Dnipro
    20, (Theoretical) The Polish Intervention

item.title: Beyond the Fringe
item.description:
About This Game

.
Fight
Primarily a third-person shooter, you can also attack enemies using a variety of tactics, including stealth kills and melee combat. Whether you're battling MilCorp soldiers or sand worms, you will always be prepared to defeat your enemy with over ten different weapon types at your disposal. *All combat can also be played using an Xbox controller*

.

Loot
Make the most of your adventure by collecting weapons from fallen enemies and selling them to Nomad Traders for credits. Alternatively, you may choose to save them in your inventory to upgrade at one of the five crafting tables located on each PZ. Loot boxes are also plentiful and can be found in unexpected places, so be on the lookout everywhere you go.

Move
Traverse the PZs with ease once you unlock your flight suit! Craft or purchase flight components and stamina boosts to enhance your flying experience.

.

Explore
Discover hidden locations as you voyage through numerous handcrafted worlds, each with an entirely different vibe and atmosphere. Enjoy the diversity of each biome as you brave the sandstorms of Sarhana1, marvel at the vibrant colors of Avathem, and soar through the canyons of the Grasslands.

Mine
Explore the PZs to find caves that contain bandits to fight and rocks to mine. Mine these rocks to retrieve valuable crystals that can be sold or used to craft high-tech gadgets.

.

Join
Pledge your allegiance to any of the four available factions to complete exciting side missions and receive powerful rewards that pack a punch.

Solve
Test your hand-eye coordination, memory, and patience as you complete a variety of puzzles to unlock doors or hack computer systems.

.

Level Up
From chatting with NPCs to obliterating enemies, you will gain experience as you interact with the world. Unlock benefits such as discount stores and vision abilities as you increase your stats.

IMPORTANT NOTE FROM THE DEVS:

We are a husband-and-wife team with no prior experience in coding or video game development! We began working in UE5 in February 2023, and we have been relying on trial-and-error as well as Epic Marketplace assets and YouTube tutorials to create our first game ever. We are extremely passionate about this project, and we worked hard to make it our own, but we are also aware that it isn't perfect. We are telling you this in the hopes that you will limit your expectations and have a far more enjoyable experience than you would have if we pretended to be something we are not.

Extra Lore:

In the beginning, all of humankind started on one planet in the Inner Rim. They began exploring and building relationships with indigenous peoples on distant planets. This area of explored space became known as the Outer Rim, separated from unknown space by a border called the fringe. When their home started dying, the Galactic Council decided it would be best for humanity to split up. They started scouting planets they had previously discovered, testing to see which ones could be terraformed to become habitable. Once a planet was deemed viable, they began negotiating with native leaders to see who would take them in. This was a slow process, as some native groups were much less willing to house newcomers than others. The indigenous peoples that agreed to the treaty did so with the condition that humans would only terraform a small part of their planet so as not to disrupt the overall environment too much. Gradually, the Council was able to start sending groups of people to settle in these newly terraformed areas, known as Population Zones. At one point, humans successfully occupied over twenty different PZs, each with their own ecosystem and societal structure.

There was an extended period of peace as humankind learned to live amongst natives in these blended communities, utilizing portals as gateways to travel between worlds. But eventually, the humans began arguing about how to govern themselves. Humanity was divided, and a faction known as MilCorp splintered off. They declared war against the Galactic Frontier Republic and began recruiting natives to fight for their cause. The PZs erupted into violence and chaos as the regions that were once thriving became completely destabilized.

After a few years, the GFR was finally able to push MilCorp back into the shadows. Tensions are still high within the PZs, but the humans have begun to rebuild and continue the relocation of citizens and resources from their dying world.

This is where you come in.

Experience our universe through the eyes of Elijah Shaw, the son of a military colonel and a renowned scientist, as you journey through the Population Zones in search of the truth. Along the way, you will face numerous enemy types with varying levels of combat and encounter a slew of different puzzles to solve. Become part of our galaxy and uncover a threat far greater than MilCorp lurking just beyond the fringe.

item.title: Brain Hotel: Remodeled
item.description:
About This Game

Comic Book inspired Point & Click adventure. You play as a delivery man, Ed Arnold, who has the misfortune of delivering a package to the Brain Hotel on the eve of their annual super-villain convention. He soon stumbles across a sinister plot that threatens the lives of countless hotel patrons and potentially the entire world! Sometimes being a hero means you have to save the bad guys!

Brain Hotel: Remodeled is a complete remake of the original 2004 Flash Based updated to take advantage of modern technology. Using a 3D engine allows us to make a fully explorable environment and bring to life a truly interactive comic book!

FEATURES
  • Recreated 3D world for a more immersive experience.
  • New content and characters not featured in the original game.
  • Classic verb based Point & Click interface.
  • Short, episode length experience.
  • Authentic Comic Book inspired graphics.
  • Newly arranged original music.
  • Fully re-recorded and voiced by talented actors.

item.title: WhichWayOut?
item.description:
About This Game

WhichWayOut? is a dark themed physics puzzle platformer.

The aim of the game is to find your way out of each level by means of abilities such as clones and light bullets.

The game will test your patience as you try to figure out what's real and what's not with limited vision and instant death awaiting failure.

The game has 20 increasing hard levels that will test the very best players.

so there is only one question left, can you make it out?

item.title: Color Summoners
item.description:
About This Game

Outwit your opponent and reduce their life points to zero!

Simultaneous Turn-Based Gameplay
Instead of taking turns, both players declare and resolve actions simultaneously. This means you must constantly anticipate your opponent's moves and make strategic decisions on the fly.
Simple Cards, Powerful Combos

Each card has a simple yet powerful effect, leading to a wide variety of combo possibilities. Discover and master devastating combos to outplay your opponent.
No Rare Cards, No P2W
Forget about common cards being inferior to rare ones! This game has no rarity system. Every card is carefully balanced, and victory depends on your ability to read your opponent and build powerful combos.

Free to Play
We want everyone to enjoy this game, so it's completely free to play.

Play with Friends or Strangers
Use the matchmaking system to find online opponents or create custom matches to play with friends.

Join the Community
Join our Discord server to find opponents, make friends, and discuss the game.

Respect

This game is a modified reproduction of a Flash card game called "Card Commander" which is no longer available.
I am not affiliated with the original creator of Card Commander, "hozo", but I would like to express my gratitude for his work.

item.title: Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem
item.description:
About This Game

Richard, a gamer boy fond of games, receives terrible news: his favorite game has undergone an overhaul patch, causing his PC to "lag".

However, Richard is a very clever kid and knows that every problem has a solution somewhere on internet. He sought help from an artificial intelligence and managed to summon two ancient gods to optimize his PC: an ancient deity whom Richard mistakes for someone named "Install Wizard" and a sort of orange cat with a very large head.

Can these unusual beings improve the performance of his PC so that he can continue playing without lag?

---

Supports Joypad and keyboard.
Keyboard controls:
Cursor key: direction
E: jump / action
D: projectile / cancel
Space: Menu
1: restart stage during Puzzle mode

B: change bezel
F: Switch between fullscreen / windowed
Esc: Exit


Touching a harmful chip or a critter won't decrease life counter if ammo can be deducted instead (100 bullets).


Features:
- 60 levels spread across 6 worlds.
- Story mode: Will Richard get a more powerful PC? Will the spirits shun him?
- Puzzle mode: Collect all the chips while using a set amount of energy!
- Invincible mode: Beat each world in the shortest time possible.

item.title: Nekokami: Internship - Relaxing World Builder
item.description:
About This Game

Nekokami: Internship is a FREE prologue to the full game of Nekokami. This prologue is standalone playable and contains 20+ Expeditions and roughly 3-4 hours of gameplay.

(ゲームの日本語ローカライズが3月末予定されています。誠にありがとうございます！)
(猫神公司:前传（暂）预定三月下旬支持中文！ 添加至您的愿望单吧！)



Enter a far-future world where Cats rule the universe and are trying to bring their old friends, the Humans, back from extinction. Become a Planetary Architect of the Cat's mega-corp, Nekokami Co., and create beautiful, cozy planets in every corner of the galaxies. Did I mention that you will need to pay your respects to the Kami, the spirits of nature present on every planet?


In this sneak peek of the full game, you will:

  • Create beautiful worlds of natural habitats and human settlements with strategic, or spontaneous, placement of tiles in a unique hand-drawn-like art style.
  • Earn your place in Nekokami Co. by creating worlds that beat expectations, or satisfy your creative urge by following your own desires. Your Cat bosses are laid back and forgiving. They are Cats after all.
  • Befriend a small selection of Kami, spirits of the nature and the universe, and see them bring miracles (or hilarious hiccups) to your work.
  • Follow the beginning of a wholesome story of Human-Cat friendship, set millennia later in the future.

Link to Full Game - Wishlist & Follow to get notified of development updates!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2840890


Nekokami Co. is commissioned to manage planets all over the universe. That's a LOT of planets! Environment, biomes and rules differ from Star System to Star System. You will get to visit at least SIX Star Systems during your internship.

I did mention the Kami*, right? Technically the spirits are the real fellows creating the worlds. As a Planetary Architect, you are basically borrowing their Creative Energy for your own use. You will need to seek their acceptance and approval. Through their friendship, you will potentially learn the secrets of nature and the arcane laws of universe. Maybe some day you will be able to wield godly powers?


*Kami is actually a Japanese word that roughly translates to "spirits and gods".

Developer's Note
This game is created by a pair of nomad developers currently living in Japan.

While the game may remind you of some famous world builders like Dorfromantik and Townscaper, our Cats, Humans and Kami have put forth their best efforts to provide you a unique gameplay experience. :) We greatly appreciate your feedback to the game in the Steam forums.

item.title: Steamboat Willie
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to a bone-chilling horror experience set a world inspired by the iconic Steamboat Willie cartoon and Slender: the eight pages. You are a daring cargo collector, navigating through an eerie forest, collecting valuable cargo while desperately avoiding the nightmarish duo, Mickey and Minnie.

Once beloved characters, Mickey and Minnie have transformed into strange entities, their hollow eyes and eerie smiles haunting your every move.

Your objective is simple: Collect valuable cargo scattered throughout the forest and return them to the dock inside a timeframe, while trying to not get caught.

Keep quiet and everything should be alright.

item.title: TEMPEST : Tower of Probatio
item.description:
About This Game

🌩️ Tempest: Tower of Probatio 🌩️

Dive into 'Tempest: Tower of Probatio', a groundbreaking CCG that revolutionizes strategic card battle with its unique ban-pick phase.
We designed for fast-paced and engaging gameplay where every move counts, it's perfect for players of all skill levels.
It now offers an enhanced experience with real-time battles against players worldwide.
Ready for a new level of strategy? Download TODAY and start your strategic journey in the innovative realm of Tempest!

🃏 Unique Deck-Building Fun: Choose from over 300 distinct heroes to create a deck that reflects your strategy and taste.
Each hero comes with unique abilities, ready to support your path to victory!

🚫 Strategic Ban Phase: Outsmart your opponents! Use the ban phase to block their top strategies and gain a tactical edge.

🌟 The Power of the Pick: Your picks can lead you to victory. Forge your own path with special strategies in every game!

🤝 The Tempest Promise: We value your commitment. Even after season resets, you can return and play effortlessly, keeping your progress intact.

🏰 Turn the Tide with Tower Power: Empower your towers with unique hero skills. One powerful move can change the course of the battle!

💪 Friendly Battles: Challenge your friends to see who's the ultimate strategist. Play now and prove your skills!


🌐 Visit our official website and communities to find out the latest news
Card Data Base: https://www.tempest-top.com/carddata_list.html
Discord: https://discord.gg/UEGTZQnDvX
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tempestcardgame

item.title: Secret Archives
item.description:
About This Game


This is a third person shooting and mild decryption game, with the main plot of a secret experiment being conducted somewhere in the future
During this process, a unique mineral was discovered and caused a large-scale infection
The situation is out of control, all non infected individuals are evacuated
And the protagonist's task is to retrieve important 'files' and escape from this place!


There are three weapons in the game, namely pistol, rifle, and shotgun
Possessing two types of auxiliary weapons simultaneously, namely self-defense daggers and grenades
There is also a synthetic ammunition system in the game, where players can synthesize the ammunition they want according to their preferences


The game adopts a box court style map, where players need to explore areas, search for lines to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and escape from this place!


there are various styles of clothes and photo taking actions scattered on the map. Once unlocked, you can go to the photo taking mode to play!


The game has added custom body shape options, whether you like plump or slim ones, you can find them here!

item.title: Crowborne
item.description:
About This Game

Crowborne is a 2D platformer With the ability to Melee, shoot Run and Fly around!.

The game follows the hero 'Twig', a crow who can take on a human form or a bird form and his
journey to find his best friend 'Flipper' a magical fox, who has been taken by Demons that have invaded Earth.

The game features:
  • - 20 Levels with 3 Boss battles and many enemies to keep you on your game.
  • - Destructible terrain, mine the ground to find gold and other materials to level up your characters abilities!
  • - Deadly weaponry. Shoot, blow and slash your way through the demon filled world.
  • - Seamlessly Transform from human form into a bird form!
  • - Blood and gore to leave a sweet taste in your mouth.

item.title: Broken Lands Village
item.description:
About This Game

The real world no longer exists! I was trapped in this cursed Village made of inkblots on parchment. Every day I'm stalked by an assasin and stuck in a time loop. None of the residents remember me, although I myself have memories. I need to get out of here ASAP!

Discover the secret of the dark Village by exploring it every day in a time loop! Find out what the Shadow Council is and what their intentions are for Your soul. Explore objects, collect items and use them to keep moving forward and discover the truth. Have interesting conversations with the inhabitants of the Village. They certainly hide more than one secret in their minds. The end is inevitable. The end will be the beginning.

Key Features:

  • Time loop - In the morning, You wake up in the town square. You must use the time until midnight as efficiently as possible to collect informations, items, talk to characters and explore new locations. Midnight is the marker of the end and a new beginning. The only thing left is the knowledge and experience acquired, or maybe something more?
  • Soul Reflection - Discover mystical decision-making possibilities. Will you keep the light within? Will the darkness consume you?
  • Character Mood - Meet the inhabitants of the Village. Remember, however, that everyone can have a bad or better day! More may depend on this than you might think.
  • Day and night cycle - Watch the sky to approximately determine how much time is left until midnight. You are stuck in a time loop, so this is a very important issue. How much can you do in the time given to you? Check on your own
  • Diary - A few sheets of paper with a cover, but you can't move without them. Accumulate knowledge in the inherent object of every seeker of truth.
  • Items - Explore locations, maybe you will find something useful?
  • Clear interface - You no longer have to search the entire screen with the cursor to find an interactive object, as in other adventure games. All this type of stuff is marked with buttons.
